name: Fasaria Legacy Collection
detailed_description:
Get our Fasaria Classic [Legacy] games all in one package now with server applications available. You will get access to play our online games in single player mode by running the server on your desktop PC. You can even set up your own server and invite friends by setting up your own network (instructions included). Update or edit the online games the way you like with simple scripts for modification.

*All games included are titles that have been discontinued and are being provided to you “as is”. All games have been tested to work under the system requirements suggested.

*All players will have access to exclusive beta testing opportunities for any future Fasaria game titles.

What is Fasaria World: Ancients of Moons MMORPG?



Fasaria World: Ancients of Moons is a single/multiplayer fantasy online experience that can be played locally from your PC (single player offline), or you cab host your own server and invite friends. Unravel the mystery behind an elusive force threatening Fasaria and her 3 moons. Build your character, space station and travel through the planetarium to discover Fasaria's secrets.

*Includes server application with easy edit scripts. You can easily launch the game from your PC for single player by launching the simple server application or set up a network where you can invite friends to play on your server. Modify the game to your liking provided you maintain the game's name and logo. The game or server can NOT be re-sold in whole or part. The game client or server can not be re-distributed in whole or in part.

  • NO MONTHLY or ADDITIONAL FEES.
  • New in game Leaderboard added. Climb the ranks and reach greatness.
  • Explore Fasaria and her 3 moons.
  • Journey through the Planetarium.
  • Populate and build your space station.
  • Level up your skills and character.
  • Collect tribute from your fleet.
  • Play slots to earn Platinum Tokens.
  • Gain karma and earn rewards.
  • Play locally or set up a network and invite friends.

What is Angels of Fasaria 2.0 RPG?:



Angels of Fasaria was originally released in 2005. With thousands of downloads and over 48 thousand active users in the browser based game, Angels of Fasaria maintained a loyal following and support base. After the release of "Fasaria World" and later the "Ancients of Fasaria" mmorpg, Angels of Fasaria RPG and the browser based game community was closed and discontinued.

After popular demand and by player's request, we submitted Angels of Fasaria on Greenlight and the community voted it in. It is now re-released on Steam, back and fully revised. Explore 4 continents as you embark on a journey to uncover the mystery behind a growing evil and secret order. Gain companions and re-claim your land as you battle your way through dungeons and a vast world in this JRPG adventure.

Enjoy the epic adventure that started it all and begin your adventure today!

About Angels of Fasaria Online:



Angels of Fasaria Online was released in 2006 and enjoyed by players from around the world. The project was eventually discontinued and the server was taken down. Based upon player's request, we have brought back the game for users to load the server and play locally right from their desk top PC. Players also have the ability to even host their own servers. The server application is available as are the maps that can be edited, modified or added, providing the game name and title is not altered and no aspect of the game or server is sold in whole or in part. The game client or server can not be re-distributed in whole or in part.

Features:

  • Several character classes to select from
  • Craft special items and weapons
  • Create your own Guild
  • Edit your world and easily add new content and areas

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP/Vista 7/8/10
  • Processor: Pentium 4 or 1.80 GHz equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Basic Color Graphics Card
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Basic Sound Card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP/Vista 7/8/10
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo 1.8 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Basic Color Graphics Card
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Basic Sound Card
